root: ^In a dark corridor, inside the cold interior of a house, you lie there, unable to move.
^A minute ago, a group of bandits barged into the house, killing and taking everything that's been here.
^With the cost of their lives, your family has managed to hid you away from them.
^But now all there's left is the darkness approaching to consume you.
^You've given up on life and the darkness looms ever closer, you've lost the will to stand up, only waiting for your inevitable death.
^As the fear for the darkness grows stronger, you ponder on your past life, wondering what kind of life you could have lived.

background: ^You reminisce about your aspiration. What kind of person you have dreamed of becoming?

b: ^ Your yearning for knowledge has left you curious about everything, and you'll never rest until your understanding of the world is complete. (Start with +1 Action Point)
^ Your unwavering spirit and resolve makes you confident in challenging all sorts of foes in your path. (Start with +5 Attack)
^ Your dedication to help people is a noble cause, though fixtated on healing others, you always find the time to take care of yourself. (Start with +25 Health)

never: ^But you never did such things, because you..
^Are too scared to take a single step.
^Have to stay and take care of your family.

b: ^ You keep finding things far more interesting, and in the end, that dream of yours is nothing but a distant memory. (Gain an extra card draw)
^ You never went to start anything, you're too afraid to make a change, in your eyes, everything is fine the way it was. (Gain the opportunity to burn a card)
^ Your family is struggling so you do what you can to provide, but now they are gone and although saved, these coins have lost their purpose. (Gain 200 extra Gold)

continue: ^Are you certain those are your past?
b: ^As you finished reminiscing your past, you close your eyes and prepare for your imminent death.

^Under all that despair, the voice hidden deep inside you resonates. The voice of the remaining hope you have left. The fragile reminder of your life and the flickering flames of your will to survive.
^There's no way you will end it like this.
^So you stand up, and take the lantern.
^And start you journey, to the sanctuary.
